# chemspectranslator

``chemspectranslator`` is a universal translator for chemical mechanism species

Based on the master spreadsheet originally conceived by Bill Carter (UC Riverside),
and adapted by Christoph Knote (Uni Augsburg) / Louisa Emmons (NCAR).

## Documentation

maintained at https://mbees.med.uni-augsburg.de

## Changelog

### 1.1.0 (2021-03-14)

- Update build system, remove Google online version

### 1.0.0 (2017-12-19)

- Peer-reviewed version to be published in Knote et al., GMD

### 0.1.0 (2017-08-12)

- Initial release
